vendor_name: Sheraton New Caledonia Deva Spa & Golf Resort
title: New Caledonia Beachfront Haven Overlooking Barrier Reef with Daily Breakfast & Kids Eat Free (Select Packages Only)
description: Discover the magic of New Caledonia with a luxury stay at Sheraton New Caledonia Deva Spa & Golf Resort. Perched along pristine golden shores, steps from a UNESCO World Heritage-listed barrier reef, this spectacular resort can be found in Bourail, a secluded part of the French territory known for its rich heritage and adventurous offerings. The splendour of the Deva Estate nature reserve is just a stone's throw away, where horseback riding, paragliding, biking and more daring land activities await. Down by the water, dive into the turquoise depths from the resort's sandy beach, where you can explore the vibrant marine life of the second-largest reef in the world, stretching across 1,600 kilometres.
location_description: Sheraton New Caledonia Deva Spa & Golf Resort
offer_address: Lot 33 Domaine de Déva, Route de Poé B.P. 50 Bourail 98870 New Caledonia

vendor_name: Sheraton New Caledonia Deva Spa & Golf Resort
title: New Caledonia Sheraton Beachfront Retreat near World's Second Largest Reef with Daily Breakfast & Resort Credit
description:
Discover the magic of New Caledonia and experience a luxurious escape at Sheraton New Caledonia Deva Spa & Golf Resort. Perched along pristine golden shores, steps from the UNESCO World Heritage-listed barrier reef, this spectacular resort can be found in Bourail, a secluded part of the French territory known for its rich heritage and adventurous offerings. The splendour of the Deva Domain nature reserve is just a stone's throw away, where horseback-riding, paragliding, biking and more daring land activities await. Down by the water, dive into the turquoise depths from the resort's sandy beach, where you can explore the vibrant marine life of the second-largest reef in the world, stretching across 1,600 kilometres.

This South Pacific paradise was made for golf enthusiasts, making a visit to the 18-hole championship golf course a must - practice your swing, and try not to get too distracted by views of the resort's lagoon. When you've had your fill of action and excitement, visit the relaxing Deep Nature Spa or bask in the glowing sun by the glittering resort pool. Round out your day in paradise by retreating to your traditional Melanesian-inspired accommodation as you watch the glowing sunset.
location_description: Sheraton New Caledonia Deva Spa & Golf Resort
offer_address: Lot 33 Domaine de Déva, Route de Poé B.P. 50 Bourail 98870 New Caledonia
